item.title: Using Python to detect malicious events at scale at Symantec Research Labs
item.description:
Description

Symantec's data lake is filled with exabytes of data. My team uses python to trawl through it to fish for hackers, and sometimes we catch some really big fish. In this talk I will discuss various techniques to catch real criminals doing nasty things across the internet.

Presentation page -- https://2018.pycon.ca/talks/talk-PC-55547 Author website -- https://www.symantec.com/about/corporate-profile/technology/research-labs#danielkats
item.dc:creator: Daniel Kats
